description: Privacy-first PDF toolkit - A hash-based Single Page Application with 100% client-side PDF processing. Features 11 implemented tools including merge, split, compress, protect, OCR, watermark, rotate, delete pages, extract pages, add text, and images-to-PDF conversion. Built with React 19, TypeScript, and Vite with optimized code splitting (91% smaller bundle). Includes SEO-optimized Astro landing pages.
rules: Always use React.lazy() for tool components - NEVER import them directly
All heavy PDF libraries MUST be in manualChunks in vite.config.ts
Use hash routing only (#merge, #split, etc.) - no browser routing
100% client-side processing - no server uploads or API calls
Preserve bundle size - initial load must stay under 100 KB gzip
Multi-language support via useI18n hook (EN, RU, DE, FR, ES)
Website (Astro) pages are SEO landing pages that link to app-SPA hash routes
